faqs.question: What are your business hours?
faqs.answer: Our branches are open from 9 AM to 5 PM, Monday to Friday. Our online banking services and this chat are available 24/7.
relatedQuestions: What is the daily ATM withdrawal limit?
How do I report a lost or stolen card?

faqs.question: How do I reset my online banking password?
faqs.answer: To reset your password, please go to the online banking login page and click on the 'Forgot Password?' link. You'll be guided through a secure verification process.
relatedQuestions: How do I report a lost or stolen card?

faqs.question: What is the daily ATM withdrawal limit?
faqs.answer: The standard daily ATM withdrawal limit is $500. If you need a temporary increase, please contact a customer support agent through our official phone line.

faqs.question: Are my deposits insured?
faqs.answer: Yes, Starlight Bank is a member of the FDIC. Your deposits are insured up to the maximum amount allowed by law.

faqs.question: How do I report a lost or stolen card?
faqs.answer: To report a lost or stolen card, please call our 24/7 support line immediately at 1-800-555-0199 or log in to your online account to freeze your card.
relatedQuestions: How do I reset my online banking password?
